general.name: ryoko
general.description: ryoko is a project management tool, designed for developers or other small- to medium sized teams to plan their tasks effectively.

details.heading: A bit of history
details.description: This web application initially started as a university project. It was built using modern web technologies and completely designed by ourselves.

boxes.title: Technologies
boxes.label: It was built using React, NodeJS, SCSS and PostgreSQL

boxes.title: Source Code
boxes.label: All the source code is available on Github.

general.description: Data Logging Solutions (short DLS) is a service to track statistics for soapbox drivers, for which I created a simple yet effective User Interface.
